text:
v>
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
May 6, 1955
Mr. Seymour N. Siegel
Director, WNYC
Municipal Broadcasting System
Municipal Building
New York 7, New York
Dear Si:
At the moment I see no reason for anyone having
any anxiety about NaEB continuing in Prix Italia. So
far as I know everything is set for this year. I cannot
presume to judge for future Board actions but I can
indicate that our action this year was affirmative
because we believe in the value of its continuance.
While I may be wrong I assume that it is relatively
too late to secure use of any funds in accordance with
Cliff NaughtonÂ»s suggestion. Personally I think we
might consider rather seriously the use of such funds
in any future years.
I believe this brings to you any comments on
all questions you have raised within recent dates. If
not, load the cannon and fire away.
Sincerely yours,
Frank E. Schooley
President
FES:ftah
cc: H. J. Skornia
